sentences.en: His rapid rise to power has given him a near-mythic status in the industry.
sentences.cn: 他迅速升任要职，这让他在业界近乎被神化了。

sentences.en: Scott of the Antarctic was a national hero of mythic proportions.
sentences.cn: 南极探险家斯科特是位赫赫有名的民族英雄。

sentences.en: Spiritual leaders gather in Wesak Valley, a mythic place high in the Himalayas.
sentences.cn: 精神领导者聚集在卫塞谷, 一块喜马拉雅山高地的神秘地方.

sentences.en: Thelma : ( proudly ) He gave me a set of books called Greek Myth mythic - mythiologgio, that's it!
sentences.cn: 塞尔玛: ( 骄傲地 ) 他送给我一套叫做“希腊神--什么来着--”的书,对了, 是《希腊神话》.

sentences.en: What if Plato made up the story for mythic purposes?
sentences.cn: 如果柏拉图所写的只是个神话故事 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 神话的；神话学的；虚构的
神话；虚构的人，虚构的事
写神话；当做神话；把……解释为神话

trans.tran_en: Someone or something that is mythic exists only in myths and is therefore imaginary
